title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3.2, Mistral, Gemma 2 and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat backend.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (renamed to Open WebUI); chat, PDF, RAG, user roles, dark mode.

title: ollama-cli (maccam912/ollama-cli)
summary: Interactive TUI for Ollama written in Go; browse, pull, chat, manage models inside the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot (cmiller01/ollama-copilot)
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a local GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-rag (zahidkhawaja/ollama-rag)
summary: Minimal Python repo showing how to build RAG with Ollama embeddings and LlamaIndex.

title: ollama4j (ollama4j/ollama4j)
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama; Kotlin & Scala friendly, supports streaming, embeddings, tool calls.

title: ollama-csharp (awaescher/ollama-csharp)
summary: .NET client library for Ollama with async streaming, embeddings, and strongly-typed models.

title: ollama-helm (thedatabaseme/ollama-helm)
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-gui (oskarkook/ollama-gui)
summary: Lightweight Flutter desktop app for chatting with Ollama models on Windows/macOS/Linux.

title: ollama-nvim (nomnivore/ollama-nvim)
summary: Neovim plugin to generate code, refactor, and chat with Ollama models without leaving the editor.

title: ollama-rust (pepperoni21/ollama-rust)
summary: Rust crate providing async wrappers over Ollama’s REST API with serde types.

title: ollama-django (mkhlffn/ollama-django)
summary: Reusable Django app that exposes Ollama chat & embeddings as REST endpoints with admin UI.

title: ollama-rails (drnic/ollama-rails)
summary: Ruby gem to integrate Ollama into Rails apps; includes ActiveRecord embeddings helper.

title: ollama-haystack (anakin87/ollama-haystack)
summary: Haystack integration by the community; use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-discord (sockheadrps/ollama-discord)
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama replies into channels with slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-obsidian (hinterdupfinger/ollama-obsidian)
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts on your notes and insert results back into markdown.

title: ollama-slack (logan-behnke/ollama-slack)
summary: Slack bot server that listens for mentions and replies using any Ollama model; deploy via Docker.
